oai_dc:dc.dc:title: A complex hyperbolic Riley slice
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Parker, John R.
Will, Pierre
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Mathematics - Geometric Topology
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: We study subgroups of ${\rm PU}(2,1)$ generated by two non-commuting unipotent maps $A$ and $B$ whose product $AB$ is also unipotent. We call $\mathcal{U}$ the set of conjugacy classes of such groups. We provide a set of coordinates on $\mathcal{U}$ that make it homeomorphic to $\mathbb{R}^2$ . By considering the action on complex hyperbolic space $\mathbf{H}^2_{\mathbb{C}}$ of groups in $\mathcal{U}$, we describe a two dimensional disc ${\mathcal Z}$ in $\mathcal{U}$ that parametrises a family of discrete groups. As a corollary, we give a proof of a conjecture of Schwartz for $(3,3,\infty)$-triangle groups. We also consider a particular group on the boundary of the disc ${\mathcal Z}$ where the commutator $[A,B]$ is also unipotent. We show that the boundary of the quotient orbifold associated to the latter group gives a spherical CR uniformisation of the Whitehead link complement.
Comment: 46 pages, 16 figures. This is an updated version including new figures figures, rewritten introduction and various corrections
